title: (x) An Affair To Remember - hand lettered {Mark S}
content:
Can't find this typeface,   
   
Please Help! ![:-)](http://web.archive.org/web/20050518051454im_/http:/www.typophile.com/forums/clipart/happy.gif) ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20050518051454im_/http:/www.typophile.com/forums/messages/83/25508.jpg)
author: lawrencel

comments.content: It looks like hand lettering. Notice how the Rs vary. I can't think of any existing fonts which would be similar offhand. That kind of A and K are very unusual.
Boy did that lettering artist have a hard time with R's and A's. I bet he/she had to do it in no time flat.

Part of the charm of hand lettering sometimes is that it doesn't look perfect. Also, I think the Rs were drawn differently to fix spacing problems. This is a common practice with hand lettering and something you can't easily do with type.
Its very fun looking and I love that its hand drawn. It makes it more personal, just the kind of feeling for that movie.
